title: Matrix Inverse Formula
text: The inverse of a 2x2 matrix $$\begin{bmatrix} a & b \\ c & d \end{bmatrix}$$ is $$(1/(ad-bc))\begin{bmatrix} d & -b \\ -c & a \end{bmatrix}$$ where ad-bc is not $$0$$.
speech: The inverse of a 2x2 matrix  the 2 by 2 matrix row 1 a, b row 2 c, d  is  parentheses 1 divided by parentheses, a d minus b c   times the 2 by 2 matrix row 1 d, negative b row 2 negative c, a  where ad-bc is not  0 .
pacedSpeech: The inverse of a 2x2 matrix   the 2 by 2 matrix row 1 a, b row 2 c, d
is    1 divided by , a d minus b c   times the 2 by 2 matrix row 1 d, negative b row 2 negative c, a
